formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SayNumber' =-
[Synopsis] Say Number
[Description] SayNumber(digits[,gender]): This application will play the sounds that correspond to the given number. Optionally, a gender may be specified. This will use the language that is currently set for the channel. See the LANGUAGE function for more information on setting the language for the channel.
